contexts.context: ...a strange way, as these short insignificant words also expressed <mark>something</mark>, words with short wings for their heavy body of meaning...
...sort of tea they gave you at Kew he felt that <mark>something</mark> loomed up behind her words and stood vast and solid behind...
...jars. Many dots and curves are below them, which form <mark>something</mark> like cushions. —— #yxj
